document_notes.text:
This update for SDL2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-33657: Fixed a heap overflow problem in video/SDL_pixels.c (bsc#1198001).

notes.text: There is a heap overflow problem in video/SDL_pixels.c in SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) 2.x to 2.0.18 versions. By crafting a malicious .BMP file, an attacker can cause the application using this library to crash, denial of service or Code execution.
